About Me

I am a PhD student in Economics at the University of Birmingham. My research mainly focuses on Macroeconomics analysis with the use of time-series data and DSGE model. I also have experience in applying programming languages such as R and Matlab to deal with data and simulations. Besides, I work as a teaching assistant for Postgraduate taught programmes including International Banking & Finance, Options and Derivatives.

Research

Work in Progress

  • Active and passive fiscal policy in a closed economy DSGE model
